Package algo.genetic

Class GeneticSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • algo.genetic.GeneticSolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISolver
    public class GeneticSolver
extends Object
implements ISolver
    GeneticSolver class The solver is inspired by this research paper: http://citeseerx.ist.psu.edu/viewdoc/download;jsessionid=9CC8F10669C22FB1E97F168D3B770E30?doi=10.1.1.359.9152&rep=rep1&type=pdf&fbclid=IwAR3XEHdHNzlu8G14-ZEWgYUmZNcEA6mICU8VlqTq5DJD4hu6qiw0Sqhr9Nc
    Author:
    Thomas

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private List<Chromosome> chromosomePool
      The pool of chromosome to do some genetic on
      private Instance instance
      Current instance.
      private static Logger LOGGER
      Class logger.
      private int maxIterations
      The maximum number of general iterations
      private int maxIterationsWithoutImproving
      The maximal number of iterations without improving the best solution
      private int minCostSpace
      The minimum cost difference to make two chromosomes not equals
      private double mutationRate
      The mutation rate (between 0 and 1) The bigger the more aggressive the genetic algo

    • Constructor Detail

      • GeneticSolver

        public GeneticSolver​(int minCostSpace,
                     int maxIterations,
                     int maxIterationsWithoutImproving,
                     double mutationRate)
        ShortestPathSolver constructor, without an Instance.

        This constructor is recommended as you can solve multiples instances by using the instance setter.

        Parameters:
        minCostSpace - the minimum delta for the cost to consider two chromosome equal
        maxIterations - the maximum of iterations
        maxIterationsWithoutImproving - the maximum of iterations without improvement of the best solution
        mutationRate - the mutation rate

      • GeneticSolver

        public GeneticSolver​(Instance i,
                     int minCostSpace,
                     int maxIterations,
                     int maxIterationsWithoutImproving,
                     double mutationRate)
        ShortestPathSolver constructor with an Instance and a minCostSpace
        Parameters:
        i - Instance to solve
        minCostSpace - the minimum delta for the cost to consider two chromosome equal
        maxIterations - the maximum of iterations
        maxIterationsWithoutImproving - the maximum of iterations without improvement of the best solution
        mutationRate - the mutation rate
